Name: Belak the Outcast
Traits: Spellcasting. The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, shillelagh1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, thunderwave2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, flaming sphere
Actions: Quarterstaff. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.
